content.body: great to have those thorough notes! I wish I had made it to this meeting. Was there a conclusion in the discussion?
they weren't as thorough as I'd like them to be.  I was in and out a little bit and it's also hard to keep up.. I am not a professional transcriptionist.  there is much that wasn't captured ðŸ™‚

> <@littledan:matrix.org> great to have those thorough notes! I wish I had made it to this meeting. Was there a conclusion in the discussion?

the conclusion was that the discussion needs to continue at the next structs meeting, and likely an overflow would be needed as well.  TG3 will be happy to host discussions as well if the time/day of our meetings works
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @littledan:matrix.org
great to have those thorough notes! I wish I had made it to this meeting. Was there a conclusion in the discussion?
the conclusion was that the discussion needs to continue at the next structs meeting, and likely an overflow would be needed as well. TG3 will be happy to host discussions as well if the time/day of our meetings works

content.body: it did seem to me like progress was being made in terms of bridging the gap between opposing positions on shared memory model concerns
